Heal.name: Hikari Amano
Heal.text: Quiet Encouragement — When an ally gains {BOND}, heal them 1 Affection. Heal 1 — Restore 3 Affection to any ally. Cleanse 1 — Remove one debuff or Curse from an ally.
Heal.flavor: You don’t have to fight alone anymore…

Shield / Barrier.name: Whisper Dandere
Shield / Barrier.text: Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent Support cards while Neutral. Dere: Gain +2 shield counters. Extreme: When you speak (play a Support), draw a card.
Shield / Barrier.flavor: When she finally speaks up, the whole battlefield listens.

Heal / Restore.name: Sunbeam Deredere
Heal / Restore.text: Start of Turn: Give bonded allies +1 {BOND}. Activated: Spend 1 {BOND} to heal 2 Affection to another waifu. Extreme: Your bonded allies gain +1 Affection when they attack.
Heal / Restore.flavor: A beam of sunshine with emergency snacks for everyone.

Boost.name: Mina Hanekawa
Boost.text: Infectious Cheer — At the start of your turn, all allies gain +1 BP until end of turn. Boost 2 — Increase an ally’s attack by +3 this turn. Heal 2 — Restore 2 Affection to all allies.
Boost.flavor: Nyaa~ Let’s give it our all together!

Shield.name: Celeste Draconis
Shield.text: Royal Command — When played, give one ally +1 {BOND}. Shield 1 — Grant +2 Shield to an ally of your choice. Charm 2 — Command one enemy waifu to defend instead of attack this turn. Pierce 3 — Deal +4 damage that ignores Shield.
Shield.flavor: Bow before my majesty, and I may let you stand beside me.

Inspire.name: Crown Himedere
Inspire.text: Leader Aura: Other allied waifus gain +1 ATK while you have the highest Affection. Dere: Your Support cards cost 1 less. Extreme: When you defeat a waifu, gain +2 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection.
Inspire.flavor: Bow properly and victory is yours to command.

Charm.name: Domination Kamidere
Charm.text: Command Phase: Spend 2 {BOND} to choose an enemy waifu; it must attack a target you pick this turn. Dere: Opponents can't ready more than one waifu during End Phase. Extreme: When you issue a command, ready one of your waifus.
Charm.flavor: Kneel now and the world might spare you.

Freeze.name: Sayo Yukinaga
Freeze.text: Cold Precision — Your first attack each turn ignores 1 Shield. Freeze 2 — Prevent an enemy waifu from acting until your next turn. Pierce 2 — Deal +3 damage ignoring Shield.
Freeze.flavor: Calm your mind. Let the cold guide your strike.

Freeze / Immobilize.name: Icebound Kuudere
Freeze / Immobilize.text: Reaction: When an opponent plays a Support, spend 1 {BOND} to cancel it. Dere: Opponents cannot gain bonus bonds outside their turn. Extreme: First trap each turn resets to face-down after resolving.

Burn.name: Aika Suzuhara
Burn.text: Hot-Headed Retort — When attacked, gain +1 Shield until end of turn. Burn 2 — Deal 3 damage over time to a target enemy. Boost 2 — Increase your attack by +2 this turn.
Burn.flavor: Don’t get the wrong idea! I just happened to be nearby.

Burn.name: Flame Tsundere
Burn.text: On Summon: Deal 1 damage to a target waifu. Extreme: +2 damage on first attack each turn.
Burn.flavor: It's NOT like she wanted to melt your defenses... idiot!

Bleed.name: Crimson Yandere
Bleed.text: On Summon: Mark a rival waifu. Activated: Spend 2 {BOND} to deal 3 damage to the marked target. Extreme: When the mark is cleared, gain +3 bonds.
Bleed.flavor: Love can be a double-edged blade. Mostly edge.

Drain.name: Reina Kurogane
Drain.text: Love or Death — When an ally falls, gain +1 {BOND} and heal 2 Affection. Drain 2 — Steal 2 Affection from an enemy waifu. Curse 3 — Inflict −2 BP for 2 turns. Charm 3 — Force one enemy waifu to skip their next attack.
Drain.flavor: Your heartbeat belongs to me now.

Berserk.name: Fracture Yangire
Berserk.text: When you attack: Flip a coin. Heads — deal +4 damage. Tails — take 2 self-damage. Dere: Gain +1 {BOND} on heads. Extreme: You may flip twice and choose the result, but suffer both tails outcomes.
Berserk.flavor: Sanity is a courtesy, not a promise.

bond.name: Bond Promise
bond.text: Choose a waifu. Gain +2 Bonds on that waifu. If that waifu is in Dere or higher, draw a card.

defense.name: Reversal Strike
defense.text: Trap Trigger: When an opponent declares an attack, prevent 2 damage and deal 1 damage to the attacker. If your defending waifu is Extreme, deal 2 instead.
defense.flavor: Tension flips momentum faster than you can say 'baka'.
